productHuntReview.reviewBody: Notion is our internal wiki at Product Hunt, although I still consider myself a semi-newb. There are a lot of features and shortcuts that I still need to learn from power-users to unlock it to its full potential.

Notion is seriously the coolest productivity tool I've ever used. It's like a mix of Trello, Google Docs, and Evernote all rolled into one. I use it to keep track of everything from my to-do list to meeting notes to personal journal entries. The customization options are endless ‚Äì you can create tables, embed media, and choose from a ton of formatting options to make your pages look exactly how you want. Plus, it integrates with so many other tools, like Google Drive and Trello, which makes it super easy to keep all of my work in one place. I honestly don't know how I managed to get anything done before I started using Notion. It's seriously a game changer.
An excellent solution for managing personal notes, data and other records. Also great for sharing information.
Notion is a can't-live-without kind of product for me.
The first tool that solves absolutely all project management tasks for my team.

Notion is a great tool that has helped shape the way that I personally work. NotionAI was just one more enhancement that makes Notion even better. Always a fan of Notion and what it does for me both professionally and personally.

This is genuinely an amazing upgrade! Very clean, but also very easy to explore templates and find the new (and hidden) ones.

Creator profiles is the biggest game changer for me! I think this was much needed as I did try to find creators I follow through the search bar on the old gallery.

Great work guys! That's why we love you so much ;)

And since Ben asked, here's me!
https://www.notion.so/@ajinkyabhat

The versatile muse of organization dances across the digital canvas, empowering our productivity and weaving together the threads of ideas, tasks, and knowledge into a harmonious tapestry of efficiency and clarity
The best notes app ever. Many templates that make amazing stuffs.

Notion has completely transformed the way I organise and manage my life and work. This remarkable platform deserves a solid 5 out of 5 rating from me. Notion provides a seamless and intuitive experience that has significantly enhanced my productivity and efficiency.

Pretty good tool! Super helpful for creating a database of team knowledge. Love the customization options (highlighting, different headings, emojis, embedding, etc.). Checking out who else has seen the doc is great too.
Notion is a great tool for organizing, taking notes, tracking tasks, and collaborating with teams. It's a great way to keep everything in one place and streamline productivity.
Great app! Friendly UI and useful features
I use it at work. It is easy to systematize and structure information. There are many opportunities for highlighting blocks of information
Cool service! Can't imagine my life without it

Notion is a really versatile tool. It‚Äôs great for organizing notes, tasks, and projects all in one place. I love the flexibility it offers, but sometimes it feels a bit overwhelming with all the features. Still, it‚Äôs awesome for personal and team use.
Definitely a learning curve, but great once you master it
I can schedule and plan my posts ahead.

productHuntReview.body: Best productivity app ever!
Easy and simple. Easy to organize a project. Setup is quick and swift. Creating tasks never been this fast.

I've integrated Notion deeply into both my personal life and my Startup Studio's operations, making it the central hub for all my planning, organization, and team management. Its versatility shines through the way it adapts to both individual and collaborative needs, proving invaluable for task tracking and project planning. The real game-changer was developing an innovative assistant to create tasks from WhatsApp messages directly into Notion, streamlining communication and task assignment within my team. Notion isn't just a tool for me; it's the backbone of my daily operations and productivity, seamlessly blending life and work in one powerful platform.
Like it. A complete tool to manage team data

Notion has been such a simple tool that it has made life easier for me and my team! A simple tool to help you get various things done in one place. When you have complex tools out there that offer similar features why buy them when Notion has made it simple and that is one of the reason for their success. Good work team, you guys deserve a high five!
Love it! Love how customizable it is
Effective business management tool. Notion is true to its Mantra "The all-in-one workspace." I use it in running my business, my life, and that of my clients.

I've been using Notion for the past year, and I can't imagine my work and personal life without it. Notion is like a digital Swiss Army knife, capable of handling almost any organizational task you throw at it.

Notion has rapidly gained popularity as an all-encompassing workspace that facilitates a wide range of functions such as note-taking, task management, project planning, and collaboration. Its unique approach, likened to assembling a Lego structure, offers users the flexibility to create customized layouts and toolkits tailored to their specific needs.

As a product manager, I have found Notion to be an invaluable asset in conceptualizing complex correlation databases and managing intricate project details. The platform's user-friendly interface and diverse set of building blocks enable seamless organization and efficient workflow management. The introduction of the Gantt chart view has been a game-changer, allowing for a visual representation of project timelines and dependencies.

However, despite its extensive features and capabilities, Notion is not without its shortcomings. One of the most notable limitations is the inability to create new entities on-the-fly, a feature that is available in other tools like Craft. This can be a significant hindrance when trying to connect databases, as it requires users to navigate away from their current task to create a new database, disrupting the workflow and hindering productivity.

Additionally, the lack of a Map view feature is a missed opportunity for Notion. As a product manager, the ability to link notes and tasks to specific locations on a world map would be immensely beneficial, providing a spatial context to information and enhancing the overall user experience.

On the topic of task management, while Notion allows for endless subtasks and provides a great deal of flexibility, the platform could be further improved by automatically propagating the duration of subtasks to parent tasks. This feature would enable more accurate and efficient project timeline planning, benefiting teams across various industries.

In conclusion, Notion stands out as a versatile and powerful tool that has revolutionized the way individuals and teams organize, plan, and collaborate. Its unique building block approach provides unparalleled flexibility, allowing users to create a workspace that is perfectly tailored to their needs. While there are areas in which the platform could be improved, such as the addition of new entity creation and Map view features, as well as enhanced task management capabilities, these limitations do not overshadow the numerous benefits that Notion offers. As a dedicated user and product manager, Notion remains my go-to tool for managing projects and maximizing productivity.

Notion is an incredibly powerful tool that can help you organize your life and work in one central location. Its flexibility, customization options, and robust features make it a valuable asset for individuals and teams alike. With a slight learning curve and potential for information overload, Notion requires thoughtful implementation to unlock its full potential.
I just love Notion, its great platform for everyone.

I like that you can do whatever you want in Notion, and it can basically replace a full stack of Trello + Confluence + some Excel sheet Roadmap, and it all will be in one place shared across the team. Amazing

The most seductive tool to go deep, from simple note taking to building entire databases. However, I stick to the more basic stuff and use the more advanced stuff wisely, so I can focus on the actual work.

The most seductive tool to go deep, from simple note taking to building entire databases. However, I stick to the more basic stuff and use the more advanced stuff wisely, so I can focus on the actual work.

I have been using Notion as a premium user since the day it launched. My whole life is inside it, and if anything happens to Notion, I would lose eight years of my life. Thanks to the Notion team for doing such a great job.
Very innovative efficiency tool, for me Formula is the most valuable feature, but it would be nice to keep providing more formula functions, I just feel like they haven't been added for a long time!

Notion can help in many ways, allowing flexible and easy usage for both personal and professional purposes. From calendars and databases to documentation and AI assistance, possibilities are wide, and the whole comes with a smooth and nice interface. A must-have today!

Finally, I managed to organize and keep messy notes from different devices, screenshots, and other things in one place‚Äîpersonal and professional stuff (and I wish I had this app when I was a student). I use it to manage projects, personal diaries, and even food recipes. Just love it so muuuuuuch!
I use it as a personal repository for notes and planner. With the current volume of data it's rather good

I love Notion for super customisable pages and databases. 
I use it for goal tracking, task management, documentation, scripts, tables, and more...

Notion is its adaptability and multifunctionality I love most. It conforms to my requirements instead of requiring me to adjust. I'm able to employ it for various purposes like jotting down notes, overseeing projects, monitoring tasks, and even as a repository of knowledge. The feature that allows the crafting of bespoke databases and templates renders it an immensely potent and tailor-able tool. It acts as an all-encompassing system for managing both my personal and work-related affairs.

Use it for my personal notes.
Its more of a brain dump for me.

Just wish it was a bit more performant and a bit more user-friendly on mobile though.

productHuntReview.body: Notion is my ultimate productivity tool. Its flexible workspace lets me organize notes, tasks, and projects all in one place. The customizable templates and collaborative features make it easy to work efficiently and stay on track. Overall, Notion has greatly improved my organization and productivity.
A great product that combines well with many SAAS products

It's like a Swiss Army knife for the digital age - a versatile, organizational wonderland where ideas flow, tasks align, and creativity soars. It's a symphony of simplicity and power, a canvas for the modern thinker, and a garden for cultivating knowledge. In a world of chaos, Notion is the conductor of order

Notion is the best tool for organizing everything I manage.As someone who does a lot of management, I have found that Notion is the ultimate tool for keeping everything organized. With its powerful features and versatile functionality, Notion allows me to streamline my workflow and manage all aspects of my work with ease. From project management to task tracking, note-taking to team collaboration, Notion has everything I need to stay on top of my game. Whether I'm working on a complex project or juggling multiple tasks at once, Notion has been an invaluable asset in helping me stay organized and productive.

Notion for me is a mixed experience. On the one hand this is one of the best note taking apps, because it allows for creating complex pages and databases. Ont the other hand its hosted nature and inability to work offline in the app makes it less trustable than a solution like Obsidian, which works fully offline and just syncs the changes when online.

That's why I use Notion only for notes I need to share with other people or for creating very simple websites.
It is a very useful app to organise all the things in once and it is a very powerful app which is used to plan up the things very quickly and very efficient app.

Notion is now the MacGyver of project management tools - perfect for the solo showrunners and small team maestros. It's like having a digital butler who not only organizes your notes but also whips up wikis, crafts product guides, and even moonlights as a website builder.

Why It Rocks:

Jack of All Trades: From scribbling down ideas to orchestrating entire projects, Notion does it with a flair that would make a Renaissance man jealous.
Wiki Wizardry: Need an internal Wikipedia? Notion's your genie.
Guide Guru: Product guides in Notion are so easy, they practically write themselves.
Web Wonder: Websites in a snap? Notion nods.
Project Management with Pizzazz:
Tasks, timelines, team huddles - Notion handles them with the elegance of a ballet dancer and the precision of a ninja.

Collaboration Carnival:
Share, comment, assign, and watch your team tango in real-time. Notion turns group work into a party.

But Wait, There's a Catch:

Brainy but Bulky: It's smart, but can get sluggish with too much on its plate.
Learning Curve Rollercoaster: Strap in; it's a thrilling ride to master Notion.
Final Verdict:
For the solopreneurs and small teams looking to juggle tasks with joy, Notion is like having a magic wand. It's a bit of a diva to learn, but once you're in tune, it's productivity paradise! üé©‚ú®üìöüöÄ

Since our Startup launch we cannot imagine working with anything else anymore. 
It took a while for Notion to find their market fit in early days though.
I use notion everyday and it just makes thing easier for me and my team. I started using it on a free plan and no we happily pay for it at our company.

My second brain. 
I put everything on Notion starting from my content planner to to-do list and my notes
Everything.

Notion is honestly a lifesaver when it comes to organizing all the chaos that comes with running a startup. It's like a Swiss Army knife for productivity. I use it to map out ideas, plan projects, track progress, and even manage my personal to-dos. The flexibility is unmatched‚Äîyou can create pages for literally anything: roadmaps, meeting notes, team wikis, or even a content calendar.

For startups, it's a no-brainer. You can collaborate in real-time, which is perfect for brainstorming sessions or when you need everyone on the same page (literally). Plus, the templates are a huge time-saver‚Äîjust pick one, tweak it, and you‚Äôre good to go.
I use it in both work and life, and I have learned the formula and database and can customize a lot of automation templates
Notion is a versatile all-in-one workspace that seamlessly integrates note-taking, task management, and collaboration, enhancing productivity and organization for individuals and teams.
Been a user of Cron for a long time, was thrilled the Notion bought them and integrated into Notion. Love it.
I use this tool everyday to manage my all works.
A great tool for team collaboration or just managing your personal life as well. You can setup goals, reminders and so much more on Notion.

Notion is quite impressive! It's like a Swiss Army knife for productivity, offering a wide range of functionalities from note-taking and project management to database creation and more. Its flexibility and customization options make it a popular choice for organizing various aspects of life or work. The ability to integrate different content types within a single platform is a big plus. However, it might take some time to get used to its interface and structure since it's quite different from traditional note-taking apps. Overall, it's a powerful tool once you harness its capabilities! Have you used Notion before?

I've been on a Notion journey for a few months. Not gonna lie, the learning curve was a bit steep initially. But once I got the hang of it, there's been no looking back, I became a fan of Notion, thanks to the powerful customization it offers.

I use Notion for organizing my work and personal projects, and it has completely transformed how I manage my tasks and information. The platform's flexibility is its biggest strength, allowing me to create custom workflows that fit my needs perfectly. Whether it's planning projects, taking notes, or tracking goals, Notion handles it all seamlessly.

The user interface is clean and intuitive, making it easy to create and link pages, embed media, and use databases. I particularly appreciate the ability to create templates for recurring tasks, which saves a lot of time and ensures consistency.

Collaboration is another standout feature. Sharing pages with teammates and working together in real time has streamlined our processes and improved productivity. The integration with other tools like Google Drive and Slack also enhances the overall functionality, bringing everything I need into one place.

While there is a bit of a learning curve initially, the extensive documentation and community support make it easier to get up to speed. Some users might find the mobile app less powerful compared to the desktop version, but it still provides essential functionalities on the go.

Notion is an incredibly powerful tool for anyone looking to organize their life and work more effectively. It's become an essential part of my daily routine, helping me stay on top of everything with ease.
Notion is a game changer! It's like you can do EVERYTHING in one place notes, tasks, projects lists. Bit of a learning curve but once you get it, whoa, productivity on steroids!

Notion is great for most use-cases regarding notes, structured data and productive systems as well as publishing simple pages publicly. Especially, the amount of integration and recent quality of life features in databases and project management options are great.
However, there are some limitations. There is no one tool that can do everything the best. Sometimes it makes more sense to use a specialized tool.

Notion is a productivity powerhouse that's transformed the way I work. Its flexibility, user-friendly interface, seamless collaboration, and constant updates make it an essential tool. It's a digital Swiss army knife for boosting productivity, and I highly recommend it.
It might seem silly, but being able to add emojis to file names was for me a big improvement! It helps organise and find things much better üñºÔ∏è
Notion is one of the best productivity tool I have ever used. It's neat and powerful with all the tools you need for knowledge management. Highly recommend!

The notion is my ultimate productivity tool,. It's a game changer for to-do lists, notes, and journaling, offering endless customization. Integrations with Google Drive and Trello keep my work streamlined. NotionAI adds an extra layer of excellence. A must-have for personal and professional organization. üöÄ #Notion is Love
